name: MA Color Candles
short_description: Excellent utility for keeping profits and spreads under control at all times, to be used on any chart with any strategy, it is developed as an indicator so can be inserted and saved with any template.

params.title: Indicator
params.content: You can select the mode with which to interpret the trend

params.title: Period
params.content: The period (number of bars) of the indicator selected in the previous parameter

params.title: Smooth
params.content: The average of the indicator values you selected in the previous parameters

params.title: K% (zero = auto)
params.content: The value of Detrended that is used to interpret the trend

params.title: Auto Period (bars)
params.content: If the value of K% is zero then it will automatically calculate the value by considering an average of the selected bars

params.title: Auto Period (bars)
params.content: If the value of K% is zero then it will automatically calculate the value by considering an average of the selected bars
